entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Attempting to write schema to writer throws exception #66557
  • Build failure in CI: LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests #66556
  • System.Text.Json tests fail around DST time change #66555

Closed

  • C# dllmain with nativeaot #66546
  • [RyuJIT/ARM32] Support fast tail call optimization #8891
    Future
  • HttpClient behavior difference between .Net 6 and .Net 5 #62136
    6.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Initialize debugger_tls_id on WASM as well. #66560
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix System.Text.Json tests affected by DST #66559
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in managed port of strong name validation #66554
    area-runtime
  • Enable some ARM32 tests #66553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove 4267 suppression from mono #66552
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Issue 66496 #66549
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

Merged

  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting the default value of WasmExceptionHandling. #66548
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Less MonoClassField arithmetic and less direct offset access #66519
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Get rid of fallback to process ids enumeration in ProcessManager.IsProcessRunning (Windows) #65041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up redundant type checks after GDV #55124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not assume containment #66385
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BB limit from importer_vectorization #66534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make ConfigurationManager.Sources public #66485
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `wasm-tools` workload to run benchmarks for wasm #66493
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add a flag to link against the system brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-13

Issues

Created

  • Installing global tools that are RID specific. #24350

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve "Convert regular string to interpolated string" refactoring #60148
  • Add Diagnostic ID column for Code Style/Whitespace/Naming Style in EditorConfig UI #60147
  • InlineHints `SuppressForParametersThatMatchMethodIntent` does not match local functions #60145
  • An exception that occurs after.NET Core is compiled to a single file #60144

Closed

  • Static abstract delegate creation within generic code cached into non-generic location #60069
    17.2
  • Convert to interpolated string does not support constants #52243
    Backlog
  • `Debug.Fail` fires for "Remove unused value" code fix provider #60030
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure declaring compilation can be located for source symbols created during compilation for EE evaluation. #60152
    Area-Compilers
  • Support property initializer statement completion #60151
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #60150
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60149
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60142
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Run two attempts of new integration tests using harness functionality #60139
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Adjust delegate caching logic for abstract statics. #60092
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Support converting to interpolated string for constants if language version is cpable of this #60146
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fixed codefix "Use discard pattern" incorrectly applied to foreach in top-level statements #60138
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Respond with updated diagnostics when EnC diagnostics state is different #60081
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60140
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Light Bulb workarounds for 17.2 CI machines #60104
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60153
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unneeded `isPartial` check #59978
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Provide name suggestions based on both collection and its element type #60129
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ability to use System.Text.Json's generated sources to improve PersistentComponentState's json read performance #40683
  • Unable to load test appsettings in integration tests #40681
  • MacOs generating https keys #40680

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers. #40671
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
